评论详情: Bought for a wedding which is formal, Fits well, soft and feels good. Only negative  is trying to get it zip up in the back without assistance.
Love this dress feels wonderful fits perfectly
Beautiful Dress!!! Want another one!!!
Beautiful party dress, it stretches a little, great quality velvet. True to size.
Looks good, drapes well, and is thicker for a colder night. Like that luxurious velvet look.

This dress is high quality.  The velvet material is nice and soft.  The sequins aren't thin and they stay on.  I ordered this in royal blue and the color is vivid.  I sent it back because I didn't like the fit of the dress on me but I loved the quality.

This dress fits beautifully. It's dressy and very modest. The glitters can poke inside, so make sure to wear camisole inside. It's a bit transparent,  but did not bother since I wore it for a night party. I am 5.1" and wear petite S size. This dress fit me nicely.

Stunning on my teenager. 5'3", 90lbs. Great for Christmas or Concerts, or a fancy evening. Well-made, have machine washed, cold, inside out 3 or 4 times now with no issues. Dry on low temp/air dry the final bit.
I loved the color of the black velvet and the sequins, but the dress did not fit very well and did not appeal to me. I am sending the dress back.
very comfortable to wear
The fit was great and my daughter loved it for a dance at school. Can’t beat the price!
This is soooo pretty great find

This red dress is made well and oh so pretty. There was one sequin that was poking through the binding at the waist but I took clippers to it and then no poking and felt so wonderful. I wore it to my mom's retirement home, holiday party along with ruby red slippers (shoes). I got so many complements. I wear a size 2X and it was perfectly sized.
I wanted to like this dress but it was not flattering on me. 5’3”, size 14-16 normally. Material was nice, sleeves on dress ok at best.

评论概述: Just right for New Year's Eve dance
评论详情: The colour is great and the fabric substantial and swingy.  Sleeves are more full than expected, but drape nicely.  The fit is just right on me (5'3" and 119 lbs) though the zipper is a challenge, as the fit is close.

This is the perfect red dress for this season's Christmas parties.  It fit very well...not too tight...and is soft velvet and nicely constructed.  I was looking for something conservative and ladylike.  This dress fits the kind of elegance I was looking for.  I think I will need to either hand wash it, because of the sequins, or wash it inside out on the gentle cycle.

I ordered this dress for the Christmas season and various related outings. While the color is nice and as the pictured, the sizing was not the best. I got a small, but the dress was still large on me. I am 5'6" and the sequined part came down to my lower waist, so the proportions were not the best. Additionally, the top was a still large on my chest and shoulders. However it is very easy to put on and the material is comfortable.
Fits true to size and it’s very flattering. I got the dark red the color is beautiful. It’s stretchy, but it does have a zipper so it’s super easy to put on.
This is a beautiful black dress perfect for any formal occasion or even a holiday event you are attending. The dress is comfortable, I am 5'8 125lbs and a small fits perfectly for me.

评论概述: Super cute and fun to twirl in
评论详情: This dress is going to be super cute for the Christmas season. It's fairly well made (for the price point) and it makes this magpie's glittery heart happy.  The velvet is SUPER soft and the sleeves are very flattering.  I got the XL, but I kind of feel like I could have sized down to the L.  For reference, I am:Bust: 39Waist: 33.5Shoulders: 15But with a belt to accessorize, it won't even matter.  It has a zipper for the back, but again it's big enough that I was able to just slip it on over my head.  I've put it on twice now and both times I forgot it had a zipper because it wasn't a problem.  Oops!This dress is a great way to fancy up your holiday looks without breaking the bank.

This is a great Christmas dress.  I'm impressed with the quality and how cute it actually is.  The material is velvety soft and it's comfortable to  wear.  I'm 5/4, 150lbs, with a long waist and it fits well.

This is a beautiful, classy dress. The velvet is nice and soft. The sparkles add a bit of something extra but it's not over the top. The flutter sleeves are fun. The bottom is flowy.  The material is a little on the heavier side but that's to be expected but it's not too heavy. The zipper is a bit stiff. I had to have my husband zip it up because I could reach it but it was too stiff to pull up. My advice is to go with your regular size. I am 5'2" 120 lbs. and according to their sizing chart I would fit a L so that is what I got. It is a little baggy so I could have ordered my normal size of M.
The dress is made very well & fits perfectly. Will be wearing it for our Christmas Choir Concert in December.

I am impressed with how this dress looks and feels. It is always a challenge to buy clothes online without being able to try them on. I have a last-minute, semi-formal occasion that I am going to and need to purchase a dress quickly.  I didn't have a lot of time to shop for one, so when I saw this dress, I thought I would give it a try. This dress is really nice, and I am impressed. The fit is true to size. I bought it in my size, and it fits like a glove. The velvet fabric is medium/heavyweight and is very soft. The sequined bodice is pretty and detailed. It looks like I bought this dress in a high-end store. I am so pleased with this purchase.

评论概述: Pretty with a vibrant Christmas red and a nice fit.
评论详情: I ordered this dress because it is the perfect red for a Christmas party and it's as pretty in person as it is in the listing. Out of the box the dress is heavier than most, which is expected since it's velvet but wears beautifully. I love the way the sleeves and skirt flow with me as I walk. The dress is a little long for me which is not a surprise. I'm 4'10" and 185 lbs. I typically wear a XL or 2XL. I ordered the 2XL and the fit is good. I like the way it looks. I was a little disappointed that the sequins are spaced apart and don't completely fill the bodice. It's more of a close-set polka dot rather than fully sequined like it appears in the listing. Someone would have to be pretty close to notice it though. The bodice is fully lined and the zipper pulls smoothly although it's not really needed. I can easily fit my head through the opening. The seams are all complete with no loose or hanging strings. The overall quality is good but the dress lacks the finishing touches that you find with the higher name brands. The cost is apropriate for the quality and fit.

评论概述: Elegant and Comfortable—Perfect for the Holiday Season!
评论详情: This velvet and sequin dress is everything I was hoping for and more! The fabric has a slight stretch, making it incredibly comfortable and easy to move in, even during longer events. The combination of velvet and sequins adds a touch of luxury that makes me feel glamorous, yet it's still soft and cozy for fall and winter gatherings. The empire waist and A-line silhouette are very flattering, and the butterfly sleeves add a unique and beautiful touch. I wore it to a recent event and received so many compliments. This dress is a perfect choice for holiday parties, weddings, or any formal occasion. Highly recommend!
This dress is so elegant and the color is lovely. The velvet fabric is gorgeous, it's so silky soft and comfortable. I ordered this gorgeous dress for a friend.
very cheap

评论概述: Pleasantly surprised by this! Dress runs true to size, has a flattering cut & the zipper works well
评论详情: This dress is super cute and comfortable, making it perfect for the holiday season. I was pleased to find that it runs true to size. I like the flattering design of the skirt – it works for a variety of body types, which I truly appreciate. The zipper functions smoothly, gliding up and down without any snagging. Nice, stretchy material. Although the sequins on the upper part of the dress are a bit larger than I would have preferred, it doesn’t detract anything from the look. Overall, I really like this dress; it strikes a nice balance between style, comfort, and functionality. Recommend!
It’s really soft and stretchy. Plan to wear it at church!
